events.message: We received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate on May 10th.
The candidate's application was categorized under the engineering department based on the resume keywords.
Recruiter John Smith was assigned to manage the software developer candidate's hiring process.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, discussing the candidate's experience with software development and devops.
The candidate responded promptly and positively, expressing enthusiasm for the software engineer role and related challenges.
A technical interview with the engineering team was scheduled for May 20th to assess coding and devops skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with the candidate demonstrating strong proficiency in software engineering principles.
Following the technical round, an HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture and compensation expectations.
The HR interview concluded positively, with mutual alignment on company values and benefits.
An official job offer for the software engineer position was proposed to the candidate including salary and benefits details.
We received positive feedback from the candidate expressing excitement to join and acceptance of the offer terms.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and is scheduled to start onboarding next month.
The onboarding process commenced successfully with orientation and setup of development environment for the new engineer.
The hiring process was completed and closed after the successful integration of the software engineer into the team.
